shortdesc.ph: 视频内容显示模式类型。

plentry.pd: 1: Uniformly scale the video until one of its dimension fits the boundary (zoomed to fit). (Default) Cropped mode. One dimension of the video may have clipped contents.
1: Uniformly scale the video until one of its dimension fits the boundary (zoomed to fit). Fit mode. Areas that are not filled due to disparity in the aspect ratio are filled with black.
